bs-rssfeeder-desc: An extension to output valid RSS for every extension, which has a buildRss-function
apihelp-bs-rssfeeder-tasks-description: Provides common tasks for the RSSFeeder
apihelp-bs-rssfeeder-tasks-summary: Provides common tasks for the RSSFeeder
bs-rssfeeder-pagetext: You can subscribe to the following RSS feeds:
bs-rssstandards-desc: Builds RSS feeds based on different options
bs-rssstandards-desc-rc: Feed with an overview over the recent changes in the wiki
bs-rssstandards-desc-page: Feed with an overview over recent changes of a page.
bs-rssstandards-desc-own: Feed with an overview over your own made contributions to the wiki.
bs-rssstandards-desc-cat: Feed with an overview over recent changes in a category.
bs-rssstandards-desc-watch: Feed with an overview over your watched pages.
bs-rssstandards-link-text-watch: Recent changes of the last {{PLURAL:$1|day|$1 days}}.
bs-rssstandards-desc-ns: Feed with an overview over the recent changes in a namespace.
apihelp-bs-rss-standards-pages-store-des: Return List of available Pages for RSSFeeder
apihelp-bs-rss-standards-pages-store-sum: Return List of available Pages for RSSFeeder
right-rssfeeder-viewspecialpage: Grants access to the [[Special:RSSFeeder]] special page.
